entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
